summary:
In a recent paper [Phys. Rev. A 76, 032304(2007)], Li et al. proposed the
definition of the residual entanglement for n qubits by means of the Stochastic
local operations and classical communication. Here we argue that their
definition is not suitable for the case of odd-n qubits.

Abstract: In a recent paper [Phys. Rev. A 76, 032304(2007)], Li et al. proposed the definition of the
residual entanglement for n qubits by means of the stochastic local operations and classical
communication (SLOCC). Here we argue that their definition is not suitable for the case of odd-n
qubits.
PACS numbers: 03.67.Mn, 03.65.Ta, 89.70.c
